name: Down in a Hole - Ludum Dare 45
name_original: Down in a Hole - Ludum Dare 45
description:
Start with nothing to live for. End with nothing to die for.

Press SPACE to start the game.

This is my first ever game jam,  so I'm quite happy with the result! Please give feedback in the comments, and vote on the LD website!

Vote here!

Down in a Hole may be adapted by a game development team for a more fleshed-out version of the game, with better mechanics and story, so look forward to that!
